item.title: My Experience with the Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: Introduction Hi there! I’ve been working on the IT helpdesk for over a year now. To keep growing professionally, I’ve decided to delve into learning about the different areas in IT. Iâ€™m currently working on a homelab but I needed a different project to sink my teeth into while I work on that. With so many fields to choose from I took a stab and chose cloud with the Cloud Resume Challenge.
